Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren, Ennidaththirku Varaththeeviriyum; Naan Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugaiyil, En Saththaththirkuch Sevikodum.
2 en Vinnappam Umakku Munbaagath Thoobamaagavum, En Kaiyeduppu Andhipbaliyaagavum Irukkakkadavadhu.
3 karththaave, En Vaaikkuk Kaaval Vaiyum; En Udhadugalin Vaasalaik Kaaththukkollum.

4 akkiramanseygira Manusharode Aagaamiyak Kiriyaigalai Nadappikkumpadi En Irudhayaththaith Dhunmaarkkaththirku Inangavottaadheyum; Avargaludaiya Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalil Ondraiyum Naan Saappidaamal Iruppenaaga.
5 needhimaan Ennaith Dhayavaaikkutti, Ennaik Kadindhukollattum; Adhu En Thalaikku Enneyaippolirukkum; En Thalai Adhai Allath Thattuvadhillai; Avargal Ikkattugalil Naan Innum Jebampannuven.
6 avargaludaiya Niyaayaadhibadhigal Kanmalaich Saarpugalilirundhu Thallundupogirapodhu, En Vaarththaigal Inbamaanavaigalendru Ketpaargal.
7 boomiyinmel Oruvan Maraththai Vettip Pilakkiradhupola, Engal Elumbugal Paadhaala Vaaikku Neraaich Sidharadikkappattirukkiradhu.
8 aanaalum Aandavaraagiya Karththaave, En Kangal Ummai Nokkiyirukkiradhu; Ummai Nambiyirukkiren; En Aaththumaavai Verumaiyaaga Vidaadheyum.
9 avargal Enakku Vaiththa Kanniyin Sikkugalukkum, Akkiramakkaararin Surukkugalukkum Ennai Vilakki Ratchiyum.
10 dhunmaarkkar Thangal Valaigalil Agappaduvaargalaaga; Naano Adharkuth Thappik Kadandhupoven.
